checkFor15MinAppt() - Method in class ViewsAndControllers.LoginController
checks if there is an appointment within 15 minutes if the user is validated, this method checks if he/she has an appointment within 15 minutes of login uses lambda to filter appointments by user uses lambda to filter appointments by start time and +15 minutes uses lambda to filter appointments by start time
checkForNoOverlap(int, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, int) - Method in class ViewsAndControllers.UpdateAppointmentController
method to check for no overlapping appointments checks if there are no conflicting appointments for a given customer uses lambda to filter all appointments aside from current appointment uses lambda to filter the appointments by customerID uses lambda to filter the appointments on the same date
